name: Poo Ninja
description:
Do you like action, shooting and gratuitous violence?
Well you came to the wrong place. I can offer you a laugh at least...

Assassinate the stealth poops and keep back the tide of grime

"Home is where you poop the most"

Installation Instructions

This is best played with a mouse, rather than a track pad

  • Download the .zip file
  • Right click the zip file -> Extract All
  • Double click on PooNinjaSetup.exe
  • Assassinate poops and make the world a better place!
